```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(stringr, warn.conflicts = FALSE))
```

```{r params, include=FALSE}
num_samples <- 800
```

```{r read_raw, include=FALSE}
cpes_raw <- mitre::cpe.nist
cpes_raw$id <- 1:nrow(cpes_raw)
```

## Create Training set

```{r cpe_sampling}
df <- mitre::createTrainSample(cpes = cpes_raw, num_samples = num_samples)
```


```{r}
readr::write_csv(x = df, file = "/DEVEL/code/data/train_cpes_ner_800.csv", col_names = FALSE)

```

```{r}
df_inventory <- mitre::getInventory()
titles <- paste0(df_inventory$vendor, " ", df_inventory$name, " ", df_inventory$version)
```

```{r}
readr::write_csv(x = data.frame(title = titles),
```
